[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0144.9866] The filing reports a value for the extension concept gdrzf:NetLossAndComprehensiveLossBasicAndDiluted in the statement 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Loss. This monetary concept appears in the statement but does not have a balance type defined. All monetary items defined in 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Loss should have a balance type of debit or credit.
